snippet: RUDOFSKY--Jesse Frank, of Belmont, MA. Music producer with group Ace, Dollface and Franky Lightning, passed on December 26. Beloved husband of Carolee Beberian Rudofsky. Son of Toby (Gross) Rudofsky and Harry Rudofsky. Father of Cherie, Jessica and Danna Heidi Rudofsky. Funeral, Holy Trinity Armenian Church, 145 Brattle St., Cambridge, MA, January 7, 11am. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RUDOFSKY--Jesse Frank, of Belmont, MA. Music producer with group Ace, Dollface and Franky Lightning, passed on December 26. Beloved husband of Carolee Beberian Rudofsky. Son of Toby (Gross) Rudofsky and Harry Rudofsky. Father of Cherie, Jessica and Danna Heidi Rudofsky. Funeral, Holy Trinity Armenian Church, 145 Brattle St., Cambridge, MA, January 7, 11am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RUDOFSKY, JESSE FRANK
